description: I have Whatsapp, Messenger, Slack and Skype all integrated here. While you can use all these in your browser, it's far more convenient to use this app as everything is in one place and it allows for system notifications.

Honestly, this app saves me having so many different windows open. I currently have Slack, Android Messages, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Skype and two Gmail accounts integrated. It's been the single biggest improvement in my work flow this year. Thanks you!
My phone is distraction for my code development times. After installing this, silent the phone and do my job. Thanks devs.
summary: Don't waste your browser windows. Install Ferdi!

description:
All the necessities are fulfilled in a beautiful ui.

Best part is you can use it without account, but having a free account doesn't hurt. Nothing much to complain about apart from minor cosmetic bugs. I sincerely hope it survives the test of time. We need apps like this.

Unfortunately it is not work on my Kali Linux =( 
I would be really happy to try it.
downloaded it , added Whatsup and gmail account. Turned password lock on and the application stuck on a black screen. reloaded the device , uninstalled it and re-installed it again same issue.

No need to open and close browser again and again.
Ferdi will do the job for you in a very organized way.
It works flawlessly!
Use your browser or use Tangram if you want a native experience
summary: It is electron, so it is a browser

description: It would be great if it support Signal too

An astonishing unified web experience with a clean UI !
Workspaces and the ability to disable/enable services are features I didn't know I needed.
It's better than Rambox in my opinion.
The app works fine for the most part and I don't have anything bad to say about it from a user experience perspective but it does use too much RAM.
summary: Makes managing a lot of chat services easier

description: Great app, does what it says on the tin

i primarily use it for discord and telegram. it's literally just a chrome window, but it's nice to have it separate from my main browser, because i don't use pinned tabs and i like having my browser closed while i'm not using it.

It used to be a great app. It helped me organize my messenger and social media accounts.

But today, on April 13th 2022, it just stopped working. Site went down, services wouldn't load, all of their social media accounts are gone, GitHub too. I dug a bit into it, found the unofficial r/getferdi subreddit, and then it became clear to me - the devs "went rogue" - they deleted their GitHub a couple months ago and started mocking people on Twitter that hated that decision. You can find screenshots and posts on the aforementioned subreddit.

So yeah, the devs' behavior was very childish. Do not download this app, it doesn't work anymore (at least with official servers), and god knows what they will do with the flatpak.
summary: Website is down, devs are gone

description: As the title says. This Flatpak is unusable, because it can't connect to the Ferdi project server.
summary: Can't connect to the Ferdi server

description: As the title says. Sometimes it just can't connect to the servers, sometimes the login button is broken, you name it.
Nice alternative to Rambox, works without problems so far.
Works without problems and as expected; provides spell-checking (in comparison to Rambox)
summary: Works as expected and is the better alternative to Rambox

description: Something went wrong
jaime beaucoup cette appli
Bouffe trop de ram (chromium) et la config des modes dark est très complexe

Почему-то всё время апка не может стартануть.
Это очень раздражает, наверное прийдётся таки отказаться от неё
Fedora 35 полет нормальный! Я правда не использую много учеток но, то что все в одном это удобно. Спасибо!

It's better than Franz.
Less used ram.
Dark mode everwhere.
